alert.note: Alert for Arroyo; Guayama; Patillas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 7:28PM ADT until November 05 at 8:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Arroyo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Guayama Municipality in Puerto Rico... Patillas Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 700 PM AST. * At 627 PM AST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arroyo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Guayama, Arroyo, and Patillas HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
